channel.title: mozilla on Julien Pivotto
channel.description: Recent content in mozilla on Julien Pivotto

item.title: F-Droid drops Firefox
item.description: Firefox will get a new name - at least on F-Droid. Firefox was alreasy known as GNU IceCat and Iceweasel. Now F-Droid will have its own rebuild, called Fennec FDroid. It removes the proprietary binaries out of the official builds. F-Droid will eventually remove Firefox out of its package list.
